title: Mortgage income verification (W-2, pay stubs)
personalDataVerified: Borrower name, employer name, gross income, tax withholdings, YTD (year-to-date) earnings, pay period
personalDataVisible: Link to employer/payroll provider system (lenders and verification services, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake pay stubs which are a massive mortgage fraud vector easily forged via Photoshop. Domain binding verifies employer or payroll provider. Tamper-evident income documentation for underwriting. Prevents stated income fraud. DTI (debt-to-income) ratio verification. Critical for mortgage lending where income verification prevents loan defaults from inflated income claims.
